com.gopivotal.examples.hbase.resplit

Class RowSamplerMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Mapper<org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.ImmutableBytesWritable,org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Result,KEYOUT,VALUEOUT>
      • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce.TableMapper<org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,org.apache.hadoop.io.Text>
        • com.gopivotal.examples.hbase.resplit.RowSamplerMapper

  • public class RowSamplerMapper
extends org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce.TableMapper<org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,org.apache.hadoop.io.Text>
    This TableMapper implementation will emit 1% of all create and delete flags.

      • setSampleRate

        public static void setSampleRate(org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Job job,
                 double rate)
        Sets the sampling rate percentage in the job configuration, 0 to 1. Default is .01 (1%)
        Parameters:
        job - The job object
        rate - The sampling rate

      • getSampleRate

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The sampling rate
